name: Tarifa Tablecloth, Napkins & Tote Bag Set - Red
description: Whip out a cheerful summer tabletop in a flash using our brightly coloured table linen set, which comes in a smart matching tote bag. Our Tarifa table linen set includes a tablecloth and six matching napkins, and the handy tote bag makes it the ideal companion for taking on summer picnics. Both the tablecloth and napkins are 100% linen and feature a contrasting border. Pair with patterned tableware for a fiesta-inspired feast.
